title: What is the best 3D printer that can print something reliable like shoes? How long would it take? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pretty much any fused deposition 3D printer can print shoes. How long it takes will depend on how much material is used. Like, sandals will print faster than sneakers. Whether or not the shoes are comfortable or last long depends on the material(s) used. Most thermoplastics aren't particularly durable or wear resistant, but the options are increasing all the time.

SHoes are mostly made up of flexible materials.You need to use TPU or Flexible rubber like material to print shoes.You can use FDM technology 3d printer like Witbox 3d printer, or 3d printer with direct extruder as it enables easy extrusion of material to make the required shape.Time to print depends on design of the object. it can take upto 8 hours to 24 hours to print a shoe design.
